Package com.i2group.apollo.purgeservice

The Intelligence Analysis Platform purge service provides clients with the ability to remove all trace of items and sets from the Analysis Repository.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IPurgeService
    A pair of methods for removing all trace of items and sets in the Analysis Repository.

Package com.i2group.apollo.purgeservice Description

The Intelligence Analysis Platform purge service provides clients with the ability to remove all trace of items and sets from the Analysis Repository.

The purge service is the only service that can destroy data in the Analysis Repository. (Data changed or deleted by other services is retained in item histories.) Access to the purge service is generally controlled through separate security settings from those that control ordinary access to items in the Intelligence Analysis Platform.

When a client has access to the purge service, there are two web methods available.

Web methodDescription
PurgeItems Completely removes the specified items (and any links connected to those items) from the Analysis Repository, so that the data in the items can no longer be retrieved.
PurgeSet Completely removes the specified entity from the Analysis Repository, and also completely removes the items in any set owned by the specified entity.

By their nature, these methods do not return results to clients as part of their normal operations.

Since:
2.0
